column1: '''Polo Baggins''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
Polo was the second child, and only son, of [[Ponto Baggins I
column2: Ponto Baggins]] and [[Mimosa Bunce]]. In his turn, Polo also had a son and a daughter, [[Posco Baggins

column1: The name ''Polo'' was meaningless in contemporary [[Hobbitish]] [[Westron]]. It represented an original name ''Pola''.<ref>{{App
